channel.title: How do i spawn an NPC?
channel.description: i need to spawn a barber. but i dont know how... yes i know im a noob at this stuff. dont mention it. can anyone tell me how?

item.title: How do i spawn an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @rune_unlimited rune unlimited
item.description:
@rune_unlimited wrote:

yeah i did that. it DOES NOT WORK. the barber guy is standing were i put him but i cant talk to him…
i click on him or right click and click on the option talk to and it does nothing…
what can i do to fix this?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i spawn an NPC?

item.title: How do i spawn an NPC?
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

madgamer:

You would go into autospawn.cfg, and add a new line with the NPC ID and Coords you want it to be.

To further add just in case you dont know how:

//Range X1: Furthest East coord. RangeY1: Furthest North coord. RangeX2: Furthest West coord. RangeY2: Furthest South coord.

from left to right. what each number is.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i spawn an NPC?
